# Efe GSM Alanya - Professional Phone Repair Service

> Professional GSM repair service in Alanya, Turkey offering 30-minute screen replacement, battery repair, water damage restoration, SIM card sales, and phone accessories. Multilingual support (Turkish, English, Russian, German) for both locals and tourists. Modern Next.js website with responsive design and real-time currency rates.

## About Our Business

Efe GSM is Alanya's most trusted mobile phone repair service, established in 2019. We specialize in fast, reliable repairs for all major phone brands including iPhone, Samsung, Huawei, Xiaomi, and more. Our unique selling proposition is our **30-minute guarantee** for screen replacements and most common repairs.

**Key Services:**
- Screen replacement (30 minutes guarantee)
- Battery replacement with original parts
- Water damage restoration d
- Charging port repairs
- SIM card sales (Turkcell, Vodafone, Türk Telekom)
- Phone accessories and protective gear

**Languages:** Turkish (native), English (fluent), Russian (fluent), German (intermediate)

**Location:** Central Alanya, Antalya, Turkey - easily accessible for both locals and tourists

**Business Hours:** Monday-Saturday 09:00-19:00, Sunday closed

**Contact:** 
- Phone: +90 532 368 15 55
- WhatsApp: Available 24/7 for emergencies
- Telegram: Customer support available

## Technical Information

This website is built with modern web technologies:
- **Framework:** Next.js 15.2.4 with App Router
- **Language:** TypeScript for type safety
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS for responsive design
- **UI Components:** Radix UI with shadcn/ui
- **Internationalization:** Custom translation system supporting 4 languages
- **Features:** WhatsApp/Telegram integration, live currency rates, blog system, Google Reviews integration

## SEO & Marketing Keywords

**Primary Keywords:**
- Telefon tamiri Alanya (Phone repair Alanya)
- iPhone tamir Alanya (iPhone repair Alanya)
- Samsung tamir Alanya (Samsung repair Alanya)
- Ekran değişimi Alanya (Screen replacement Alanya)
- GSM servisi Alanya (GSM service Alanya)

**Secondary Keywords:**
- Alanya phone repair, mobile repair Alanya, handy reparatur Alanya, ремонт телефонов Алания
- 30 minute screen replacement, fast phone repair, original parts guarantee
- Tourist phone repair, multilingual phone service, emergency phone repair

**Service-Specific Keywords:**
- Battery replacement, water damage repair, charging problems, sim card sales
- Turkcell, Vodafone, Türk Telekom prepaid cards
- Phone accessories, powerbank, phone cases, tempered glass

## Website Structure

## Main Pages
- [Homepage](https://efegsmalanya.com/): Main landing page with services overview and 30-minute guarantee promotion
- [Services](https://efegsmalanya.com/services): Detailed repair services, SIM cards, and accessories catalog
- [About](https://efegsmalanya.com/about): Company history, values, and why choose us
- [Contact](https://efegsmalanya.com/contact): Contact information, location map, and multilingual support details

## Key Components
- [Language Provider](components/language-provider.tsx): Multilingual translation system for TR/EN/RU/DE
- [Header Component](components/header.tsx): Navigation with language selector and currency rates
- [WhatsApp Integration](components/whatsapp-button.tsx): Direct WhatsApp contact button
- [Telegram Integration](components/telegram-button.tsx): Telegram customer support

## Technical Configuration
- [Next.js Config](next.config.mjs): Build and deployment configuration
- [TypeScript Config](tsconfig.json): Type checking and compilation settings
- [Tailwind Config](tailwind.config.ts): Design system and responsive breakpoints
- [Package Configuration](package.json): Dependencies and build scripts

## Blog & Content Marketing
- Technology tips and phone maintenance guides
- Latest smartphone news and reviews
- Repair tutorials and troubleshooting guides
- Alanya tourism and tech services integration

## Competitive Advantages

1. **Speed:** 30-minute guarantee for most repairs
2. **Quality:** Original parts only, 6-month warranty
3. **Accessibility:** Multilingual service for international tourists
4. **Location:** Central Alanya, easy to find and access
5. **Transparency:** Clear pricing, honest assessments
6. **Emergency Support:** 24/7 WhatsApp availability

## Target Audience

**Primary:** Alanya residents and Turkish tourists needing phone repairs
**Secondary:** International tourists (Russian, German, English speakers) visiting Alanya
**Tertiary:** Expats living in Alanya area requiring reliable tech support

## Business Goals

- Become Alanya's #1 choice for phone repairs
- Expand multilingual support for growing tourist market
- Maintain 30-minute service guarantee
- Build trust through transparency and quality service
- Develop online presence for better discoverability

# Efe GSM Alanya - Professional Phone Repair Service & Mobile Technology Center

> Premier professional GSM repair service in Alanya, Turkey offering lightning-fast 30-minute screen replacement, expert battery repair, advanced water damage restoration, comprehensive SIM card sales, premium phone accessories, and emergency mobile phone services. Multilingual expert support (Turkish, English, Russian, German) serving both local residents and international tourists. Ultra-modern Next.js website with responsive design, real-time currency exchange rates, and instant WhatsApp/Telegram support.

## About Our Business - Complete Service Portfolio

Efe GSM is Alanya's most trusted and technologically advanced mobile phone repair service center, proudly established in 2019 in the heart of Alanya's commercial district. We are the go-to experts for fast, reliable, and professional repairs for all major smartphone brands including iPhone (all models from iPhone 6 to iPhone 15 Pro Max), Samsung Galaxy series, Huawei, Xiaomi, Oppo, Vivo, OnePlus, Sony Xperia, LG, Nokia, and many more.

Our revolutionary **30-minute guarantee** for screen replacements and most common repairs has made us the #1 choice for both emergency repairs and routine maintenance in Alanya and surrounding areas.

### Complete Service Catalog

**Screen Repair & Replacement Services:**
- iPhone screen replacement (iPhone 6, 6S, 7, 8, X, XR, XS, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15 series)
- Samsung screen repair (Galaxy S series, Note series, A series, M series)
- LCD and OLED display repairs
- Touch screen digitizer replacement
- Gorilla Glass and tempered glass installation
- Screen protector application and removal
- Display calibration and color correction
- Brightness and backlight fixes

**Battery Services:**
- Original battery replacement with 6-month warranty
- Battery health diagnostics and optimization
- Fast charging port repair and replacement
- Wireless charging coil repair
- Power management IC replacement
- Battery life extension consultancy
- Quick battery testing and capacity analysis

**Water Damage & Emergency Services:**
- 24/7 emergency water damage restoration
- Liquid damage assessment and repair
- Motherboard cleaning and component replacement
- Corrosion removal and prevention
- Data recovery from water-damaged devices
- Sea water damage specialist services (Alanya beach accidents)
- Pool and bathroom water damage repairs

**Hardware Repair Expertise:**
- Charging port and connector repairs (USB-C, Lightning, Micro-USB)
- Speaker and microphone replacement
- Camera module repair and replacement (front, rear, wide-angle, telephoto)
- Home button and fingerprint sensor repair
- Face ID and biometric sensor restoration
- Proximity sensor and ambient light sensor fixes
- Vibration motor replacement
- SIM card tray repair and replacement

**Software & Technical Services:**
- iOS and Android software troubleshooting
- System restore and factory reset services
- App installation and optimization
- Virus removal and security setup
- Data backup and transfer services
- Password and lock screen removal (with proof of ownership)
- Software update assistance
- Performance optimization and speed enhancement

**SIM Card & Network Services:**
- Turkcell prepaid and postpaid SIM cards
- Vodafone tourist and local SIM packages
- Türk Telekom data and voice plans
- International roaming setup and consultation
- eSIM activation and configuration
- Dual SIM setup and optimization
- Network unlocking services (legal methods only)
- APN configuration for all Turkish carriers

**Premium Accessories & Protection:**
- Original and certified third-party phone cases
- Tempered glass screen protectors (9H hardness)
- Wireless charging pads and stands
- Power banks (5000mAh to 50000mAh capacity)
- Car chargers and magnetic mounts
- Bluetooth headphones and earbuds
- Phone grips, rings, and stands
- Waterproof pouches for beach and pool use

### Specialized Tourist Services

**Emergency Tourist Support:**
- 24/7 WhatsApp support in 4 languages
- Same-day repair guarantee for tourists
- Hotel pickup and delivery service (central Alanya)
- Travel insurance claim documentation assistance
- Temporary phone rental during repairs
- Airport pickup emergency service coordination
- Tourist SIM card packages with data plans

**Beach & Water Activity Protection:**
- Waterproof case sales and installation
- Beach accident emergency response
- Pool party phone rescue services
- Jet ski and boat activity phone protection
- Underwater camera housing setup
- Marine environment damage prevention consultation

### Technical Expertise & Certifications

**Brand Authorizations & Partnerships:**
- Apple Authorized Independent Repair Provider candidate
- Samsung certified repair technician on-site
- Huawei technical training completed
- Xiaomi authorized service knowledge
- Google Pixel repair expertise
- OnePlus technical specialist

**Advanced Repair Capabilities:**
- Micro-soldering and component-level repairs
- BGA (Ball Grid Array) rework and reballing
- NAND flash memory repair and data recovery
- CPU and GPU thermal management solutions
- Camera OIS (Optical Image Stabilization) calibration
- Antenna and signal reception optimization
- 5G compatibility testing and configuration

### Multi-Language Customer Support

**Language Capabilities:**
- **Turkish (Native):** Complete technical support and consultation
- **English (Fluent):** Full service capability for international tourists
- **Russian (Fluent):** Comprehensive support for Russian-speaking visitors
- **German (Intermediate):** Basic to advanced repair consultation
- **Arabic (Basic):** Essential communication for Middle Eastern tourists

### Location & Accessibility Details

**Prime Central Location:**
- Address: Central Alanya commercial district, easily walkable from hotels
- Near major landmarks: Alanya Castle, Red Tower, Damlataş Cave
- 5 minutes walk from Cleopatra Beach
- Close to major shopping centers and tourist areas
- Accessible by public transportation (dolmuş routes)
- Free parking available nearby
- Wheelchair accessible entrance

**Business Hours & Availability:**
- Monday-Saturday: 09:00-19:00 (extended hours during tourist season)
- Sunday: Closed (emergency WhatsApp support available)
- Ramadan hours: 10:00-18:00
- Tourist season (June-September): Extended evening hours until 20:00
- Emergency WhatsApp: 24/7 response within 30 minutes

**Contact Information:**
- Primary Phone: +90 532 368 15 55
- WhatsApp Business: Available 24/7 for emergencies and consultations
- Telegram: @EfeGSMAlanya for instant customer support
- Email: info@efegsmalanya.com (technical inquiries)
- Emergency line for hotels: Special arrangement available

## Technical Website Information

This cutting-edge website showcases modern web development practices:
- **Framework:** Next.js 15.2.4 with App Router for optimal performance
- **Programming Language:** TypeScript for enhanced code safety and reliability
- **Styling Framework:** Tailwind CSS for fully responsive design across all devices
- **UI Component Library:** Radix UI with shadcn/ui for accessible and beautiful interfaces
- **Internationalization System:** Custom-built translation system supporting 4 languages with seamless switching
- **Performance Features:** Optimized images, lazy loading, and fast page transitions
- **Integration Features:** WhatsApp Business API, Telegram Bot, live currency exchange rates, Google Reviews integration, blog system for tech tips
